The jump voice is very annoying, but you can turn it off.

review: The concept is cool,but the puzzles are clunky. The biggest problem is that the physics are a bit to clunky for the game to be fun since the puzzles rely on it so heavily. This was a tough vote though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103129787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1675187576}
review:
Oyun çok tatlı grafiklere sahip ayrıca mekaniğini çözünce çok da zor gelmiyor. Bulmacalarda gayet iyi sizi çok zorlamıyor ama benim sinir olduğum kısım şu bölümde bir yerde hata yapınca bölümü tekrarlama tuşu yok anladığım kadarıyla bu yüzden o yerden çıkıp ana menüye dönünce en başından beri geçtiğim bölümleri tekrardan geçip o takıldığım bölüme ulaşmam gerekiyor. Onun dışında gayet iyi bir oyun çerezlik iyi gider yani. 
 
Bu arada oyun kontrol ettiğimiz kızımız da hafiften bir little nightmares dadı veriyor :)

review: It’s fine I guess? This feels like a final for a student game degree for Fez. You can shift perspectives to move objects around in specific. Some of the later puzzles are actually decent with some interesting ways to move objects. Overall, the game is meh? I wouldn’t really pay for it and I have no motivation to 100% it but it’s not bad for free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050034324', 'num_games_owned': 647, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1616453062}
review: Я не фанат паззлов и платформеров, но здесь прямо таки приятно удивлен. Мне понравилась механика переключение миров, некоторые головоломки заставляли задуматься. Круто, еще и бесплатно. Автор большой молодец, я бы за эту игру даже заплатил.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053053976', 'num_games_owned': 310, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1613404960}
review: Pretty good game overall, I really like the concept of the game and the creativity that was added to it by putting the crystals in locations that you really have to think to find.  The gimmick of the game is what makes the game fun but I think that this is a game of missed potential, it could have been so much better with more added worlds and other gimmicks that take advantage of the mechanics of the game.  Overall 7/10 I would recommend it to someone who needs to kill and hour or two or is looking for an easy 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287660327', 'num_games_owned': 930, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1610250753}
review: Игра супер. Головоломки сразу в 2х измерениях топ! Хотя уровни лёгкие, а сама игра проходится за час, парочка задачек заставили прям задуматься над решением. Хотелось бы получить побольше новых уровней

author: {'steamid': '76561198861843648', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1595746218}
review:
横視点の2D操作と見下ろし視点の3D操作を切り替えながらゴールを目指すパズルプラットフォーマー。

2D状態では地形の奥行きが無視され3D空間上ではありえないルートを通って進むことができ、また2Dでは重なって通れない地形の隙間を3D状態では通ることができる、2つのモードを状況に応じて切り替えステージを攻略していくゲームで、慣れるまでは戸惑うが進み方が分かると不思議な面白さがある。

敵やゲームオーバーなどの要素は無く手順が分かれば丁寧に操作するだけで良く、ギミックが登場してくると多少複雑になってくるがゴールを目指す分には素直に進めて行けばたどり着くことができ、収集要素のクリスタルの回収には一捻りした操作が要求される。

無料かつ2～3時間程度でクリアできるボリュームで個々のステージも短めなので手軽に遊ぶことができる。
カジュアルな見た目でカジュアルなゲームという割と貴重な部類、主人公がカワイイ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198042620952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1382, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1651335351}
review:
[h1] Genre [/h1] Ein 2D/3D Puzzle Platformer

[h1] Story [/h1] Wir spielen ein Kleines Mädchen oder einen Jungen (Keine Ahnung) und müssen in 3 Welten jeweils einen Großen Kristall finden um nach Hause zurückkehren zu können

[h1] Gameplay [/h1] Es gibt 3 Welten (Wald, Wüste, Tundra) wo wir jeweils das Ziel erreichen müssen. Das besondere bei diesem Spiel ist, das man jederzeit zwischen 2D & 3D switchen kann um Kisten & Schiebe Rätsel zu lösen. In jeder Welt gibt es 8-9 Level und in jeden einzelnen Level kann man jeweils einen Kristall finden. Die Level an sich sind nicht allzu schwer aber alle Kristalle zu bekommen ist schon etwas schwieriger

[h1] Achievements [/h1] Es gibt insgesamt 8 Erfolge. Man bekommt alle wenn man das Spiel komplett durchspielt und alle Kristalle einsammelt

[h1] Pro/Contra [/h1]
+ Kostenlos
+ Musik OK
+ Grafik OK
+ Sehr Nette Gameplay Idee mit dem switchen zwischen 2D & 3D
+ Achievements
+ Sammelkarten (droppen aber nicht weil das Spiel Kostenlos ist)
+ XBox 360 Controller Support

[h1] Fazit [/h1] Ein schöner Puzzle Platformer bei dem man jederzeit zwischen 2D & 3D hin und her switchen kann um Puzzle zu lösen. Eine ganz Nette Idee und die Level machen Spaß und es ist auch noch Kostenlos. Wer Puzzle Platformer mag, sollte sich dieses Spiel ruhig mal genauer anschauen
